text:
If you think you’ve seen it all, you might want to take another guess. Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh’s and Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas’ weddings might have had us all excited, swooning and obsessing over the minutest details, but the wedding season isn’t over yet. There’s a lot that you are yet to witness.
In case you are wondering what then picture this - Hillary Clinton has arrived in India to attend the wedding of Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal. From Lakshmi Mittal to Sachin Tendulkar, and Shah Rukh Khans to Bachchans, you name and Udaipur has them all at the wedding location.
What’s more? Well, Shan Rukh Khan performed with his wife Gauri Khan at the Sangeet ceremony of the duo. And not just them, even Aishwarya Rai Bachchan-Abhishek Bachchan and newly-wed Priyanka Chopra gave a breathtaking performance, it is said.
Don't Miss 343 SHARES 555 SHARES 263 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
And if that wasn’t enough, Queen Bey is here in India. Yes, the Grammy-award winning singer Beyonce has arrived in the city of lakes. What for? Well, a private concert of course!
And fans are going bonkers!
So @Beyonce is in India to perform at Isha Ambani's wedding and I am not ok I am going crazy bye. — Vipin | TN Follows (@vipinheartstay) December 9, 2018
If y’all thought Priyanka-Nick wedding was extra, wait for ambani wedding 💀 Beyoncé is performing for wedding guests pic.twitter.com/pxgrYyaVVr — Sascha Holidayerer (@samstennis189) December 9, 2018
Some says #TheRoyalWedding was the biggest wedding of this year some says #DeepVeer some #priyankaNick hold on bitches #Beyoncé is performing at Ambani’s daughter wedding and Hillary Clinton is attending it in India. So everyone else can shut up now #weddingofyear — Annie Dutta (@AnnieDutta1) December 9, 2018
Beyonce gonna sing Channa Mereya at the Ambani's wedding💉💉💉💉💉💉 pic.twitter.com/7VWncIhbhR — Krishna (@SolariSznn) December 9, 2018
Beyonce is at Isha Ambani's wedding?!! What the fuck!! 😂😂 — Meowshi (@zoowaker) December 9, 2018
Beyonce is in India... Weeps... That too for a wedding... Weeps... An Ambani wedding... Weeps... — Muskaan Gupta (@imuskaang) December 9, 2018
Ambani uncle thoda concert ke liye bhi bolona @Beyonce didi ko — ✨𝓟𝓮𝓻𝓾✨ (@pretaehyungah) December 9, 2018
Beyonce to perform at Ambani’s wedding??🙄
Please use very border-crossing loud speakers. It’s the closest I’ll ever get to her😔 — Shizza (@Shizza_hashmi) December 9, 2018
Beyonce performing at the Ambani wedding. That's what real money buys. Destroyed Priyanka's and Deepika's wedding in one move. — RAJ SAHOTA (@1RajSahota) December 9, 2018
Now, this is what we call dream come true.
title: Beyonce:All Hail Queen Bey! Beyonce Lands In Udaipur To Amp Up Isha Ambani-Anand Piramal’s Wedding
description: Beyonce AKA Queen Bey is here in India. Yes, the grammy-award winning singer Beyonce has landed in the city of lakes. Wondering what for? Of course, for a private concert! What’s more? Well, Shan Rukh Khan performed with his wife Gauri Khan at the Sangeet ceremony of the duo.
